name: 3th3r
description:
Made in 48 hours for the MEGA Newbies and Vets Game Jam 2020!

Featuring hand-drawn frame by frame animations,  hand-drawn backgrounds, spook-tacular music and some Hallow's Eve fun!!

How To Play:

  • Use arrow keys to move
  • Avoid the zombies! If they see you, they'll chase you!
  • Try to escape the laboratory with your life!

Credits:

  • Kobi Saha
  • Truman Costello
  • Aryan Kapoor
  • Yasmin Gil
  • Aylish Turner

Download Instructions:

  • Just hit that download button, unzip the folder, and play the build!
